twitter.description:
While at the United Nations, stumping for
international action on ISIS, President Barack Obama used the
killing of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, as an example of

"racial and ethnic tensions" within our own country. It's also
an example of what happens when your governmental authority is just
too powerful and unaccountable, but funny how that does
